summary: When two friends, Dominique and Ursula, uncover an ancient book in a graveyard one night, they discover that the book has the supernatural power to grant any evil desire written within it. ... See full summary »
cast: Alexz Johnson|Miriam McDonald|Deanna Casaluce|Magda Apanowicz|Andrea Brooks|Tyler Boissonnault|Brian Krause|Laura Carswell|Jake LeDoux|Andrew Francis|Pablo Coffey|Jason Calder|Aleks Holtz|Malcolm Scott|Moses Tang|Dana McLoughlin|Avan Jogia|Alexander Calvert
title: Devil's Diary
